Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: The Access-Control-Allow-Credentials response header tells browsers whether to expose the response to the frontend JavaScript code when the request's credentials mode ([Request.credentials](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Request/credentials)) is include. - [MDN Link](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Access-Control-Allow-Credentials)
